channel.title: Ireland on Koreanderson's Travel Log
channel.description: Recent content in Ireland on Koreanderson's Travel Log

item.title: Ireland 2016
item.description: My second destination in Europe was visiting my close friend Matthew in Ireland. Matthew was also at the reunion in Amsterdam, so afer having a pint at the airport we boarded a flight for Cork, Ireland. Cork was pleasantly small but full of character. It’s a city where you can find live Irish music at the bar on any given night. During the small time that I was in Cork I was able to walk around the city during the day and sightsee quite a bit.
